name: XWUI Empty Component
description: Empty state component for displaying when there is no content to show. Supports title, description, image, icon, and optional action button. Useful for empty lists, search results, and error states.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

size.description: Size of the empty state component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the empty component

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

title.description: Title text for the empty state

description.description: Description text for the empty state

image.description: Image URL to display in the empty state

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string to display in the empty state

label.description: Label text for the action button

onClick.description: Click handler function (not serializable in JSON)
